text: Mahgarita stevensi is a genus of adapiform primate that lived in North America during the late Eocene. Fossils of the genus were found in the Duchesnean Laredo and Devil's Graveyard Formations of Texas. == References == === Bibliography === * Category:Prehistoric strepsirrhines Category:Eocene primates Category:Prehistoric mammals of North America †Mahgarita Category:Prehistoric primate genera Category:Paleontology in Texas Category:Fossil taxa described in 1976
title: Mahgarita
